# init(widthDimension:heightDimension:)

**Initializer**

Creates a size with the specified width and height dimensions.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(widthDimension width: NSCollectionLayoutDimension, heightDimension height: NSCollectionLayoutDimension)
```
